response.overview: After escaping an emotionally abusive relationship when her ex is sent to prison, a woman finds happiness with a new man who treats her with the love and respect she's always wanted. Just as her life begins to settle into peace, her ex is released and becomes obsessed with getting her back. Determined to reclaim her at any cost, he spirals into a dangerous pursuit, forcing her to confront her past and fight to protect her new life and love.
response.title: No Turning Back
